text: Chengiz () is a 2023 Indian Bengali language action thriller movie. The movie was directed by Rajesh Ganguly and written by Neeraj Pandey and Rajesh Ganguly. The movie stars Jeet in the titular role and the supporting cast includes Sushmita Chatterjee, Rohit Roy and Shataf Figar. The movie was made under the banner of Grassroot Entertainment, Jeetz Filmworks and AA Films. ==Cast== * Jeet as Chengiz * Rohit Roy as ACP Samir Sinha * Susmita Chatterjee * Shataf Figar ==References== == Other websites == * Category:2023 action movies Category:Gangster movies Category:2023 thriller movies Category:2020s action thriller movies Category:2020s Indian movies Category:Hindi-language movies
title: Chengiz
